author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IVO MOVING WESTWARD WELL OFFSHORE OF BAJA CALIFORNIA...
summary: ...IVO MOVING WESTWARD WELL OFFSHORE OF BAJA CALIFORNIA... As of 8:00 PM MST Fri Aug 08 the center of Ivo was located near 20.5, -112.1 with movement W at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 999 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IVO MOVING WESTWARD WELL OFFSHORE OF BAJA CALIFORNIA... As of 8:00 PM MST Fri Aug 08 the center of Ivo was located near 20.5, -112.1 with movement W at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 999 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Ivo (EP4/EP092025)
